mapper.select: SELECT T.id as companyId, T.company_name, T.credit_code, T.company_type, T.company_nature, T.company_mark, T.status, T.modify_emp, T.modify_time FROM t_company T join t_r_department_company T1 on T.id = T1.department_id where T1.department_id=#{id}

SELECT T.id companyId, T.company_name, T.credit_code, T.company_type, T.business_start_time businessStartTime, T.business_deadline businessDeadline, T.company_address, T.business_scope, T.legal_person, T.registered_capital, T.establish_time, T.registered_institution, T.issue_date causeTime, T.registered_status, T.liscense_path, T.company_nature, T.registration_address, T.bank_name, T.bank_account, T.telephone, T.company_mark, T.status companyStatus, T.create_emp, T.create_time, T.modify_emp, T.modify_time, T.remark FROM t_company T
T.id =#{companyId}
mapper.update: update t_company t1 set t1.company_name = #{companyName}, t1.credit_code = #{creditCode}, t1.company_type = #{companyType}, t1.business_start_time = #{businessStartTime}, t1.business_deadline = #{businessDeadline}, t1.company_address = #{companyAddress}, t1.business_scope = #{businessScope}, t1.legal_person = #{legalPerson}, t1.registered_capital = #{registeredCapital}, t1.establish_time = #{establishTime}, t1.registered_institution = #{registeredInstitution}, t1.issue_date = #{causeTime}, t1.registered_status = #{registeredStatus}, t1.liscense_path = #{liscensePath}, t1.company_nature = #{companyNature}, t1.registration_address = #{registrationAddress}, t1.bank_name = #{bankName}, t1.bank_account = #{bankAccount}, t1.telephone = #{telephone}, t1.company_mark = #{companyMark}, t1.status = #{companyStatus}, t1.modify_emp = #{modifyEmp}, t1.modify_time = now(), t1.remark = #{remark} where t1.id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: select T.id, T.company_name, T.credit_code, T.company_type, T.company_nature, T.company_mark, T.status companyStatus, t1.account_name modifyName, T.modify_time from t_company T,t_account t1 where T.id in (select t.company_id from t_r_department_company t where t.department_id = #{departmentId} AND t.status=1) and T.modify_emp=t1.id order by T.id desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_r_department_company( department_id, company_id, create_time, modify_time, status, create_emp, modify_emp ) values( #{departmentId}, #{companyId}, now(), now(), 1, #{createEmp}, #{modifyEmp} )
mapper.select: select t2.account_name accountName, t3.staff_name staffName from t_company t1,t_account t2,t_staff t3 where t1.create_emp=t2.id and t2.staff_id=t3.id and t1.id=#{companyId}
